participant_1.background:
I'm a busy person with a lot of demands on my time.
i ride a motorcycle , but its not a harley.
I remember when I was a little girl, I would dance around in my living room to the music of my favorite ballets.
i cook every night.
My most prized possession is my comfy couch, where I can relax and enjoy a bowl of pistachio ice cream.

participant_2.background:
I prefer to explore new places with my sister.
I am a single, language genius who enjoys shopping and collecting memories from my travels.
I love listening to the band Gorillaz while I'm working at my candy store.
I would not be able to be a pharmacist if I were blind because I would not be able to read the labels on the medication bottles.
i hate running.

content.text: What's your favorite thing to do in your spare time?
I love exploring new places with my sister. It's so much fun to see new things and experience different cultures.
I agree! It's always great to get out of your comfort zone and try new things. Where's your favorite place you've ever traveled?
I'm a huge fan of Japan. I love the culture, the food, and the people. I've been to Tokyo a few times, and I'm always looking for new places to visit.
That sounds amazing! I've always wanted to go to Japan. I've heard it's a beautiful country.
It is! And the people are so friendly and welcoming. I'm sure you'd love it there.
I'm really hoping to make it there one day.
You should! It's an amazing place.
What do you like to do for fun?
I love to listen to music, shop, and collect memories from my travels. I also work at a candy store, so I get to enjoy all kinds of delicious candy.
That sounds like a fun job! I love candy too.
Me too! I'm a bit of a sugar addict.
I can relate! I love anything sweet.
I'm glad I'm not the only one!
Me too! We should go on a candy run together sometime.
That would be so much fun! I love shopping for candy.
Me too! We could go to the mall or something.
